Class School

java.lang.Object
school.School
public class School extends Object
The School class represents a school. This class is used for the project to hold information a regular school would hold, including a list of staff and students and classes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan

  • Constructor Details

    • School

      public School(String name)
      Constructs a school with a name. An ID is randomly generated, and the lists are instantiated. This is meant for schools created during runtime.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the school

    • School

      public School(String name, int id)
      Constructs a school with a name and ID. The lists are instantiated. This is meant for schools created during compile time (i.e., schools that are already present).
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the school
      id - the school ID

  • Method Details

      Returns:
      the added admin

    • searchStudentByID

      public Student searchStudentByID(int id)
      Returns a student with an identical ID to the ID passed in as a parameter. Returns a null student if no student has the same ID as the ID passed in.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID to check for
      Returns:
      the student with that ID

    • searchTeacherByID

      public Teacher searchTeacherByID(int id)
      Returns a teacher with an identical ID to the ID passed in as a parameter. Returns a null teacher if no teacher has the same ID as the ID passed in.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID to check for
      Returns:
      the teacher with that ID

    • searchClassByName

      public Class searchClassByName(String name)
      Returns a class with an identical name to the name passed in as a parameter. Returns a null class if no class has the same name as the name passed in.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check for
      Returns:
      the class with that name
